colour.BRENEMAN_EXPERIMENTS_PRIMARIES_CHROMATICITIES¶

colour.BRENEMAN_EXPERIMENTS_PRIMARIES_CHROMATICITIES = {1: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=1, illuminants=array([u'A', u'D65'], dtype='<U3'), Y=array(1500), P_uvp=array([ 0.671, 0.519]), D_uvp=array([-0.586, 0.627]), T_uvp=array([ 0.253, 0.016])), 2: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=2, illuminants=array([u'Projector', u'D55'], dtype='<U9'), Y=array(1500), P_uvp=array([ 0.675, 0.523]), D_uvp=array([-0.466, 0.617]), T_uvp=array([ 0.255, 0.018])), 3: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=3, illuminants=array([u'Projector', u'D55'], dtype='<U9'), Y=array(75), P_uvp=array([ 0.664, 0.51 ]), D_uvp=array([-0.256, 0.729]), T_uvp=array([ 0.244, 0.003])), 4: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=4, illuminants=array([u'A', u'D65'], dtype='<U3'), Y=array(75), P_uvp=array([ 0.674, 0.524]), D_uvp=array([-0.172, 0.628]), T_uvp=array([ 0.218, -0.026])), 6: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=6, illuminants=array([u'A', u'D55'], dtype='<U3'), Y=array(11100), P_uvp=array([ 0.659, 0.506]), D_uvp=array([-0.141, 0.615]), T_uvp=array([ 0.249, 0.009])), 8: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=8, illuminants=array([u'A', u'D65'], dtype='<U3'), Y=array(350), P_uvp=array([ 0.659, 0.505]), D_uvp=array([-0.246, 0.672]), T_uvp=array([ 0.235, -0.006])), 9: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=9, illuminants=array([u'A', u'D65'], dtype='<U3'), Y=array(15), P_uvp=array([ 0.693, 0.546]), D_uvp=array([-0.446, 0.773]), T_uvp=array([ 0.221, -0.023])), 11: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=11, illuminants=array([u'D55', u'green'], dtype='<U5'), Y=array(1560), P_uvp=array([ 0.68 , 0.529]), D_uvp=array([ 0.018, 0.576]), T_uvp=array([ 0.307, 0.08 ])), 12: PrimariesChromaticityCoordinates(experiment=12, illuminants=array([u'D55', u'green'], dtype='<U5'), Y=array(75), P_uvp=array([ 0.661, 0.505]), D_uvp=array([ 0.039, 0.598]), T_uvp=array([ 0.345, 0.127]))}¶

Breneman (1987) experiments primaries chromaticities.
